thread.title: 8 pictures that tell the entire story of Atlanta’s devestating Super Bowl loss | For The Win
thread.title_full: 8 pictures that tell the entire story of Atlanta’s devestating Super Bowl loss | For The Win

author: Michelle R. Martinelli
title: 8 pictures that tell the entire story of Atlanta’s devestating Super Bowl loss | For The Win

persons.name: jessica mcgowan/getty images ap photo/charlie riedel

text:
By: Michelle R. Martinelli | February 5, 2017 11:58 pm Follow @MMartinelli4 
Atlanta Falcons fans were feeling good after their team scored its third unanswered touchdown in the first half. 
When the Falcons went up 28-3 after the break, it looked like all they had to do was hang on. But that proved too much , and their dreams of a Super Bowl Championship were crushed as the New England Patriots pulled off an unprecedented comeback. 
Here are those roller coaster feelings captured. Photo by Troy Taormina-USA TODAY Sports Photo by Gregory Shamus/Getty Images Photo by Jessica McGowan/Getty Images Photo by Jessica McGowan/Getty Images Photo by Eric Seals-USA TODAY Sports Photo by Eric Seals-USA TODAY Sports Photo by Jessica McGowan/Getty Images AP Photo/Charlie Riedel
